titleStmt.title: The present interest of England stated by a lover of his king and countrey.
titleStmt.author: Bethel, Slingsby, 1617-1697.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Slingsby Bethel. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
This item identified on film as Wing B2072, is now Wing (2nd ed.) B2072A.
Reproduction of original in University of Chicago Library.
